title: Bloomberg Surveillance: The Fed Decides 12/10/2025
description: Lisa Abramowicz and Tom Keene host a special edition of "Bloomberg Surveillance" covering Federal Reserve chair Jerome Powell's remarks in which Federal Reserve officials delivered a third consecutive interest-rate reduction. Guests include, JPMorgan’s Bob Michele, Charles Schwab’s Kathy Jones, Societe Generale Sumatra Rajappa, Bianco Research’s Jim Bianco, KPMG’s Diane Swonk, Deutsche Bank Matthew Luzzetti, Wolfe Research’s Stephanie Roth, Bank of America’s Aditya Bhave, BlackRock’s Jeffrey Rosenberg. (Source: Bloomberg)
